com.udeyrishi.androidelasticsearchdatamanager

Class JsonFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.udeyrishi.androidelasticsearchdatamanager.JsonFormatter

  • public class JsonFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for specifying the JSON format the JsonDataManager should use. Created by rishi on 15-10-30.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonFormatter(boolean useExplicitExposeAnnotation, boolean usePrettyJson)
      Creates an instance of the JsonFormatter.

      Registers a type hierarchy adapter to be used when constructing the Gson object via getGson() method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonFormatter

        public JsonFormatter(boolean useExplicitExposeAnnotation,
             boolean usePrettyJson)
        Creates an instance of the JsonFormatter.
        Parameters:
        useExplicitExposeAnnotation - True, if the @expose annotations are to be explicitly used, else false. If this is set to true, only the fields with the annotation @expose will be serialized/de-serialized.
        usePrettyJson - True, if the serialized JSON needs to be in "pretty" format (with appropriate newlines and indentations). False, if the JSON needs to be in a single line.

    • Method Detail

      • getUseExplicitExposeAnnotation

        public boolean getUseExplicitExposeAnnotation()
        Gets the JsonFormatter's current "use explicit expose annotation" setting. If this is set to true, only the fields with the annotation @expose will be serialized/de-serialized.
        Returns:
        The current "use explicit expose annotation" setting.

      • setUseExplicitExposeAnnotation

        public void setUseExplicitExposeAnnotation(boolean useExplicitExposeAnnotation)
        Sets the JsonFormatter's current "use explicit expose annotation" setting. If this is set to true, only the fields with the annotation @expose will be serialized/de-serialized.
        Parameters:
        useExplicitExposeAnnotation - The new "use explicit expose annotation" setting.

      • getUsePrettyJson

        public boolean getUsePrettyJson()
        Gets the JsonFormatter's current "use pretty JSON" setting.
        Returns:
        True, if the serialized JSON needs to be in "pretty" format (with appropriate newlines and indentations). False, if the JSON needs to be in a single line.

      • setUsePrettyJson

        public void setUsePrettyJson(boolean usePrettyJson)
        Sets the JsonFormatter's current "use pretty JSON" setting.
        Parameters:
        usePrettyJson - True, if the serialized JSON needs to be in "pretty" format (with appropriate newlines and indentations). False, if the JSON needs to be in a single line.

      • getGson

        public com.google.gson.Gson getGson()
        Gets the Gson object configured with the settings of this JsonFormatter.
        Returns:
        The properly configured Gson.

      • registerSerializer

        public void registerSerializer(java.lang.Class<?> classOfObject,
                      com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<?> serializer)
        Registers a type hierarchy adapter to be used when constructing the Gson object via getGson() method.
        Parameters:
        classOfObject - The Class of the object to be serialized.
        serializer - The custom JsonSerializer to be used for this type.
